original_text: And his return was to Ramah; for there was his house; and there he judged Israel; and there he built an altar unto the Lord.
korean_text: 라마로 돌아왔으니 이는 거기에 자기 집이 있음이니라 거기서도 이스라엘을 다스렸으며 또 거기에 여호와를 위하여 제단을 쌓았더라

sentences.original_text: And his return was to Ramah
and there he built an altar unto the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그곳에서 주를 위해 제단을 쌓았다
